en: Respone
Increase the target's temperature by %1.
Increase the temperature of a creatures you own by %1.
Decrease the target's temperature by %1.
Destroy a cold creature with temperature -%1 or greater.
Desroy all hot creatures with temperature %1 or lower.
Increase temperature of all ally creatures by %1.
Decrease temperature by %1 during enemy turn.
Increase temperature by %1 during enemy turn.
Moves the target creature to it's owners hand.
Changes the target's temperature %1 points toward zero.
Sacrife a creature and destroy all weaker creatures.
Draw %1 cards.
Invert the target's temperature.
Increase the owners temperature by %1.
Decrease the owners temperature by %1.
Destroy all creatures with temperature between -%1 and 0.
Destroy all creatures with temperature between 0 and %1.
Spawns %1 %2 when destroyed in combat.
Decreases the attackers temperature by %1 when attacked in battle.
Increases the attackers temperature by %1 when attacked in battle.
Destroys the attacker if it's level is at most %1 when attacked in battle.
Sacrifice all creatures you own and increase this creatures temperature by their total temperature.
Move all creatures' temperature %1 point towards the global temperature.
Restore the target creatures temperature to the default value.
